item.title: Couple of weird things happened today
item.description: Note: This is an archived post from my unmaintained Tumblr blog https://k4rtik.tumblr.com

item.title: On Blogging
item.description: Something interesting happened this morning which leads to existence of this post. I had gone to visit a long time friend and mentor Amarjit at his home. It was unusual of him to not welcome me at the door himself. I soon learnt why — Deepak Malani was there! I know Deepak for about 4–5 years now, mostly from stories told by seniors (of IEEE Glory Days) and from Amarjit himself.
